title: Is it just me or do all the asians hop on at 4 am?
body:
Sometimes I will be up late at night and at around 4 am I notice a sudden and major increase in the amount of chinese players online. Has anybody else noticed all the asians hop on around 4 am? They are also pretty toxic and say shit like "I shit down your mother's throat". That's mainly the insult they use I haven't seen much variance, very unoriginal.

Cheers, my friends! :^)
